summary: The Sims is a popular video game where players create and control virtual characters called "Sims." Developed by Maxis, it's a life simulation game with no specific goals, allowing players to build houses and guide their Sims' emotions and actions. With over 200 million copies sold, it's one of the top-selling gaming franchises. The series began with the original *SimCity* in 1989 and has expanded with new packs, offering more ways to play and interact with Sims.
title: The Sims
